TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TextEffectResolver extends System.Object
public ref class TextEffectResolver abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Helper 類別，這個類別可設定文字容器中的文字效果。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>文字的文字效果。 以下是範例 XAML。
[!code-xaml[FlowMiscSnippets_snip#TextEffectTargetExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowMiscSnippets_snip/cs/texteffecttargetexample.xaml#texteffecttargetexamplewholepage)]
以下是此範例的程式碼後置。
[!code-csharp[FlowMiscSnippets_snip#TextEffectTargetCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowMiscSnippets_snip/cs/texteffecttargetexample.xaml.cs#texteffecttargetcodeexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Documents.TextEffectTarget[] Resolve (System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer startPosition, System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer endPosition, System.Windows.Media.TextEffect effect);

public: static cli::array <System::Windows::Documents::TextEffectTarget ^> ^ Resolve(System::Windows::Documents::TextPointer ^ startPosition, System::Windows::Documents::TextPointer ^ endPosition, System::Windows::Media::TextEffect ^ effect);

Docs.summary: 將文字範圍中的文字效果解析為文字效果目標清單。
Docs.returns: 物件的集合，這個集合對應至文字範圍。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 針對每一個連續的文字區塊，此方法會建立為目標的範圍 （父系） 項目文字效果。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>文字的文字效果。 以下是範例 XAML。
[!code-xaml[FlowMiscSnippets_snip#TextEffectTargetExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowMiscSnippets_snip/cs/texteffecttargetexample.xaml#texteffecttargetexamplewholepage)]
以下是此範例的程式碼後置。
[!code-csharp[FlowMiscSnippets_snip#TextEffectTargetCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowMiscSnippets_snip/cs/texteffecttargetexample.xaml.cs#texteffecttargetcodeexamplewholepage)]
